channel.title: Help grrrr
channel.description: i need someone to tell me how i make it so u need lvl 99 to wield the skillcapes on silabs clients! :confused:

item.title: Help grrrr
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

it depends on which skill cape you want

search

clattack

until you see stuff like

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemID == 10704) { return 99; } }

i use item idâ€™s beacuse its easier

add this under cl attack or cldefence

String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemID == item id) { return skill level; } }

you can add your own ints to for fletching and any other skills you want

Read full topic
